>>38119481

You wire through twenty-five credits, and see a familiar smile, a row of razor-sharp teeth unfolding in darkness.

“Ehehe-he-he.” They growl a deep laugh. “Tell me, dear child. What wonders have you seen since we last met?”

> Ask about Velika and Kjorikos.
> Ask about a player by name.
> Ask about a skill, ability, or archetype by name.
> Ask about a Celestial Artifact by name or owner.
> Try to make it answer another question. (Write-in)
> Ask for a refund.
name: BSO
